verbose_text: The PD-1 ability to inhibit the initiation of both the TCR and CD28 signaling pathways explains the pleiotropic functional outcomes that result from its engagement and accounts for the ability of PD-1 to suppress TILs directed against non hematopoietic tumor cells that express ligands of PD-1 but not those of CD28.
evidence: suppress TILs directed against non-hematopoietic tumor cells that express ligands of PD-1 but not those of CD28
